fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.admissioncontroller

Class ControllerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.admissioncontroller.ControllerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestcontrolleurI, java.io.Serializable

    public class ControllerTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestcontrolleurI
    The class Task represents a task to be run on AdmissionController

    Description

    The task indicate the number of ApplicationVM , number of core , InboundApplication URI RequestSubmissionInboundPort of the RequestDispatcher , Application URI and InboundApplication URI

    Invariant 

     invariant      taskURI != null and request != null

    Created on : April 9, 2015

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
